data.prayer: Father, convict the 13,805 believers in Telemark to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Telemark, Norway
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 13,805 believers in Telemark.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Telemark, Norway know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Telemark. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Bosniak people.
Spirit, of the 137,674 people in the state of Telemark who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Telemark to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Telemark a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

location.name: Telemark
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Lebanese, Pashtun, Southern, Albanian, Dutch, Arab, Syrian
